root.title: mead mea file 150 mln dlr shelf registr
root.body: mead corp say file shelf registr secur exchang commiss cover potenti debt secur offer 150 mln dlr say underwrit offer may includ smith barney harri upham co inc goldman sach co and/or salomon brother inc mead say proce use retir short-term debt portion incur financ part recent acquisit ampad corp zellerbach distribut group
